Chapter Previous Next

class gstBoundingVolume

GHOST Class to inherit from to define bounding volumes An instance of this class is pointed to by the gstBoundedHapticObj.

From header file: gstBoundingVolume.h

Constructors and Destructors
~gstBoundingVolumeDestructor.
gstBoundingVolumeThis class is intended as a base class only, the constructors are protected so that instances can not be created.
gstBoundingVolume
gstBoundingVolume
Functions
getNeedsUpdate Internal method Accessor for getting the update state of this bounding volume.
getOwnerNode Internal method Accessor for getting the owner node of this bounding volume.
setNeedsUpdate Internal method Accessor for setting the update state of this bounding volume.
setOwnerNode Internal method Accessor for setting the owner node of this bounding volume.
withinBoundingVolume Internal Method
Virtual Functions
CloneCloning function.
asBox
asSphereMethod to downcast a pointer of this type to a specific bounding volume class.
getCenterVirtual function for getting the center of the bounding volume.
getDistanceWCThis method will return the smallest distance between the input point and the bounding volume in world coordinates;
setCenterVirtual function for setting the center of the bounding volume.
testLineIntWCPredicate method as to whether a sphere intersects the volume.
updateUpdates the position of the bounding volume object.
